website_summaries.verdict: A simple fermentation kit that does much of the work for you.
pros: Lids feature date tracker, 1-way airlock valve, and easy-grip tabs for opening
The design is low profile for easy storage in cupboards
Materials are BPA-free to guarantee a food-grade, mold-free experience
Product has 1 year warranty with free club membership
cons: 4 total lids limits your fermentation possibilities

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I first bought another similar system like these but they were on backorder so I settled for these. I wasn't disappointed with these by no means. They performed like they were suppose to and I actually liked the lids a bit better with these because they are more transparent then my solid black ones. I do wish the pumps they send with all these kits were of a better quality though. Pumps in both kits are very cheap and perform cheaply too. I'm always afraid I'm going to break them. Still they got my peppers fermented and made me a could sauce that'll keep for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I made some really good pumpkin hot sauce. I like being able to put the jars on a shelf in the pantry versus the jars with the water seals that are too tall and the water level has to be monitored. The grips make it easy to open also. But I don’t really care too much about the date reminder.

product_meta.title: Fermentation Lids Kit by Brillenti. 4 waterless airlock fermenting lids fit wide mouth mason jars. Easy Grip fermenter lid with Oxygen Pump automatically Vents air- Tracks your lacto ferment date.
product_meta.description:
Tired of burping those lids?

Let our lids do the work for you.

You love to ferment. We make it Easy.



Automatic Valve

Waterless airlock valve allows gases to escape and prevents oxygen from entering your ferment. Fill with vegetables and brine, screw on the lid, set the date and let your new lids do all the work.

It's that simple.



Oxygen Extraction Pump

Simple Pump will remove oxygen if you open the jars to test during the fermentation process. So go ahead and test without worrying about introducing mold.



Unique Easy Grip Tabs

Your lids have 4 easy to grip tabs with smooth rounded edges. This design makes these the easiest lids to open once your probiotic veggies are done fermenting. This is exclusive to Brillenti Easy Grip.



Comfortable to Use

These are the only lids with rounded upper edges making them the most comfortable on your hands.



Raised Center Valve

The valve is raised to prevent brine from entering the pump. Another design feature exclusive to Brillenti Easy Grip.



Low Profile Lid Design

Modern design replaces those bulky water airlocks and allows filled jars to fit easily into your cupboard. Nice right?



Date Tracking

No need to remember your fermentation date or use paper labels. Simply set the indicator and enjoy perfect mold free ferments every time.



 Our lids are designed to make your ferments easy, simple and worry free.



Your No Hassle Satisfaction Guarantee

Your satisfaction is guaranteed with a manufacturer 30 day money back guarantee and 1 year replacement warranty.

You can buy with complete confidence.



Add To Cart and begin enjoying your Easy Grip ferments!
